div.p: Dear David Douglas Families, Today, Oregon Gov. Kate Brown announced that all schools will remain closed for the rest of the school year, through June...

The David Douglas School District values and recognizes the diversity of all individuals and groups. Every student’s learning experience should be fostered in an inclusive and safe environment so they can excel. Non Discrimination Policy (District Title IX Contact – Director of Human Resources, 503-261-8205 // District 504 and ADA Contact, Director of Student Services, 503-261-8209).
